about_the_game:
Overview

Dr. Voss' Escape Room is a fun and relaxing multiplayer puzzle game where you and up to 4 friends work together to solve a variety of challenging puzzles. Set in the mysterious lab of Dr. Alaric Voss, you'll uncover hidden clues, piece together the story, and unlock the secrets behind his quest for the immortality potion.

This is a game for those who enjoy taking their time to think things through and solving clever puzzles with friends in a chill, pressure-free environment.

Key Features

  • Play Together: Team up with friends to solve puzzles designed for collaboration and communication.

  • Challenging Puzzles: From balancing scales to deciphering hidden messages, every puzzle will test your problem-solving skills.

  • Relaxed Gameplay: No rush, no stress, just a fun, shared experience of unraveling the mysteries of Dr. Voss’ lab.

  • Progression Tracking: Watch your progress unfold as you solve puzzles and get closer to escape the room with the immortality potion.

What to Expect

  • Explore and Discover: Use tools like UV flashlights to reveal hidden messages and clues.

  • Solve Together: Work as a team to unlock doors, crack codes, and piece together the story.

  • Create the Ultimate Potion: Follow the clues to blend potions in the correct order, leading to the lab’s final secret.

  • Around 1 Hour of Gameplay: Enjoy a focused and engaging escape room experience that can be completed in about an hour, perfect for a fun session with friends.

Why You’ll Love It

Dr. Voss' Escape Room is perfect for groups of friends looking for a relaxed but rewarding experience. It’s not just about solving puzzles, it’s about working together, thinking creatively, and enjoying the journey.

So grab your friends and see if you have what it takes to escape Dr. Voss’ lab!

Future Plans

We’re committed to improving and expanding Dr. Voss' Escape Room:

  • Bug Fixes: Actively addressing any issues to ensure a smooth experience for all players.

  • New Maps: We’re exploring the possibility of adding additional escape rooms with new puzzles and environments.

  • Community Feedback: We want to hear from you! Your suggestions and ideas can help shape future updates.

name: Dr Voss’ Escape Room

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 / AMD HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD RX 580
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Dr. Voss' Escape Room is a relaxing multiplayer puzzle game for up to 4 friends. Explore a mysterious lab, solve challenging puzzles, and uncover secrets to create the immortality potion. Perfect for those who love teamwork, creativity, and a chill escape room experience!
